A

activate(IuApiCredentials) - Method in interface edu.iu.auth.oauth.IuAuthorizationClient
Revalidates credentials as having been verified, not expired, not revoked, and not prohibited by an environment restriction specified by the application realm or authentication provider, as a condition for session activation.

Revalidates verified credentials as not expired, not revoked, and not prohibited by an environment restriction specified by the application realm or authentication provider, as a condition for session activation.
